description: The startViewTransition() method of an Element object starts a view transition that affects only that element's DOM tree. The contain: view-transition CSS declaration contains the layout of the tree to be transitioned. You can use this to run separate elements' transitions concurrently.
description_html: The startViewTransition() method of an Element object starts a view transition that affects only that element's DOM tree. The contain: view-transition CSS declaration contains the layout of the tree to be transitioned. You can use this to run separate elements' transitions concurrently.
name: Element-scoped view transitions
